Aiming to simplify logistics in the Latin American market, Intelipost is the leading freight management platform in Brazil. With a solution based on cloud logistics, which smartly integrates the entire logistics chain with highly reliable technology, the company serves more than 4,000 stores, and performs, on average, 1 billion freight quotations
READ MORE
Products and Services
Powered by AI
Edit Products and Services Section
Product Name
  Product Description
  Cotação (Quotation)
Automated quotation rules to reduce shipping costs and increase conversion rates.
Despacho (Dispatch)
Platform to manage and control dispatch operations.
Entregas (Deliveries)
Solutions for managing and tracking deliveries.
Reversa (Reverse Logistics)
Platform for managing reverse logistics processes.
Auditoria de Faturas (Invoice Auditing)
Service for auditing shipping invoices to ensure accuracy.
Torre de Controle (Control Tower)
Centralized system for monitoring and managing logistics operations.

Where is Intelipost's headquarters? Intelipost is located in São Paulo, Sao Paulo, Brazil.
Who invested in Intelipost? Intelipost has 3 investors including Riverwood Capital and Performa Investimentos.

obfuscated
.
When was the last funding round for Intelipost? Intelipost closed its last funding round on Dec 8, 2020 from a Series B round.
Who are Intelipost's competitors? Alternatives and possible competitors to Intelipost may include Pathao, ShipBob, and ShipMonk.
